prod_desc: Watch little bakers serve up cute LEGO® DUPLO® cakes!
prod_long_desc:
See how many different cakes your child can build for a birthday party or just a special treat! Toddlers will love coming up with different combinations, sparking creativity while developing fine motor skills. For café-based role-play, recipe inspiration or building practice, this set serves up all kinds of fun. LEGO® DUPLO® bricks are specially designed to be fun and safe for little hands.
Includes two buildable cakes, plus candle and flower elements.
Develop early building skills as your child comes up with different cake combinations.
This small set with big bricks offers great entertainment value.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 1½-3 years.
Cupcake measures over 2” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
Birthday cake with candle measures over 3” high, 2” wide and 1” long.
